name: CPMapTemplate.PanDirection
desc: The directions a user can pan (or move) a map displayed on the CarPlay screen.

items.name: static var down: CPMapTemplate.PanDirection
items.desc: The user panned the map downward.

items.name: static var left: CPMapTemplate.PanDirection
items.desc: The user panned the map to the left.

items.name: static var right: CPMapTemplate.PanDirection
items.desc: The user panned the map to the right.

items.name: static var up: CPMapTemplate.PanDirection
items.desc: The user panned the map upward.

items.name: init(rawValue: Int)
items.desc: Initializes a pan direction using the specified raw value.
